title: Proficiency
content: to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with Simple Weapons. Cleric Lvl 1 Fighter Lvl 1 Ranger Lvl 1 Rogue Lvl 1 Warlock Lvl 1 Heavy Armour Proficiency Feature Wearing Heavy Armour will not impose disadvantage on your attacks or prevent the casting of Spells. Life Domain (Cleric Subclass) Lvl 1 Fighter Lvl 1 Strength Saving Throw Proficiency Feature Add your proficiency bonus to Strength saving throws.
